name: BK's Super Onewheel Adventure
description:
Controls:

  • UP ARROW  - Jump
  • UP ARROW AGAIN BEFORE LANDING - Double-Jump Attack

Bound back through time with BK, saving him from deadly situations that he could not avoid on his first pass through time! Leap through each level, avoiding obstacles and dangerous beasts!

If you walk or jump into enemies they will damage you. If you do BK's patented double jump ATTACK, you will knock them out instead! Don't let the beasts get the best of you!
